wikipedia_page.main: Scott Tiffoney (born 26 August 1998) is a Scottish professional footballer who plays as a winger for Partick Thistle in the Scottish Championship. Tiffoney has previously played for Greenock Morton, Clyde and Ayr United, and started his career in the youth system at St Mirren.

response: His younger brother Scott Tiffoney is also a footballer.The Next Big Thing... This week, Scott Tiffoney, Greenock Telegraph, 5 December 2013

link_mentions.page: List of Scottish Professional Football League monthly award winners

response: Four of Morton's U17 league winning side were offered full-time development contracts with the club; they were John Mitchell, Ruaridh Langan, Alex McWaters (all 17) and 16-year-old Scott Tiffoney.
Winger Scott Tiffoney and full-back Lewis Strapp signed new deals to tie them to the club until summer 2018.
Scott Tiffoney joined League Two side Clyde on loan until January.
John Tennent was released at the end of his short-term contract, as Scott Tiffoney returned from Clyde.
